channel.title: Cvars!
channel.description:
trying to edit weapon damage and I keep getting "UNKNOWN COMMAND" Checking the skill.cfg shows there is no weapon damage sk's anywhere, adding them causes the console to blurt out "UNKNOWN COMMAND X" when it starts up.
How the hell do you edit weapon damage. ![UNKNOWNBS.png|370x161](upload://g14Ql2JQDXZPvaiBepRdDs9OV6z.png)

item.title: Cvars!
item.dc:creator: Devalut
item.description:
trying to edit weapon damage and I keep getting “UNKNOWN COMMAND”
Checking the skill.cfg shows there is no weapon damage sk’s anywhere, adding them causes the console to blurt out “UNKNOWN COMMAND X” when it starts up.

How the hell do you edit weapon damage.

Read full topic
